dict.acceptation: 蘑菇；蘑菇状物，蘑菇形物体；（女用）蘑菇形草帽；暴发户；
蘑菇的；蘑菇形的；迅速生长的；雨后蘑菇似的；
迅速增长；采蘑菇；迅速增加；（火）猛然的扩大；

sent.orig: A mushroom, a mushroom. It's a mushroom.
sent.trans: 蘑菇，蘑菇，这是一只蘑菇。

sent.orig: Rinse, dry and slice oak mushroom, straw mushroom and sau chun mushroom.
sent.trans: 先将鲜冬菇、草菇及秀珍菇洗净沥乾，然后切片。

sent.orig: Buy: Frozen chestnuts, Frozen peas (snow peas), Frozen mushroom, shiitake mushroom, button mushroom.
sent.trans: 采购：冷冻栗子，冷冻豌豆角，冷冻木耳，香菇，小蘑菇（未开伞的）

sent.orig: I want to a mushroom. I really wish I was born as a mushroom.
sent.trans: 我想变成一样蘑菇，我真的希望自己生下来就是一株树下的蘑菇。

sent.orig: Economical folk-customs and mushroom folk-songs that encompass mushroom planting are outstanding representative elements amon.
sent.trans: 其中围绕香菇种植的香菇经济民俗和香菇山歌便是诸多传统文化中的突出代表。
